Method Detail

activateVelocityPlanning

void activateVelocityPlanning(boolean activateVelocityPlanning)
Activate the velocity planning after a destination was reached.

Parameters:
activateVelocityPlanning - true if velocity planning should be activated

setDestination

long setDestination(com.kuka.roboticsAPI.geometricModel.AbstractFrame newDestination,
                    double[] translTargetVel)
Set the new destination.

Note: The orientation change is realized by interpolating Euler angles. To avoid problems with gimbal lock the maximum change of the Euler angle B is limited to +/- 60 degrees. This limit is calculated starting from the initial pose of the SmartServoLIN motion.

Parameters:
newDestination - The new cartesian position [mm].
translTargetVel - The target velocity for x,y,z in the cartesian space [mm/s].
Returns:
The time stamp in milliseconds
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the limit of Euler angle B is violated

setDestination

long setDestination(com.kuka.roboticsAPI.geometricModel.AbstractFrame newDestination)
Set the new destination.

Note: The orientation change is realized by interpolating Euler angles. To avoid problems with gimbal lock the maximum change of the Euler angle B is limited to +/- 60 degrees. This limit is calculated starting from the initial pose of the SmartServoLIN motion.

Specified by:
setDestination in interface com.kuka.roboticsAPI.motionModel.IServoRuntime
Parameters:
newDestination - The new cartesian position.
Returns:
The time stamp in milliseconds
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the limit of Euler angle B is violated

setMaxTranslationVelocity

void setMaxTranslationVelocity(double[] value)
Sets the maximum translational velocity value for this servo motion [mm/sec].

The specified value is a maximal value for the servo motion.

Parameters:
value - the absolute translational velocity value for this servo motion [mm/sec]. This value must be greater than 0.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if absolute velocity value is equal or less than 0.

setMaxOrientationVelocity

Sets the absolute orientation velocity value for this servo motion [rad/s].

The specified value is a maximal value for the servo motion.

Parameters:
value - the absolute orientation velocity value for this servo motion [rad/s]. This value must be greater than 0.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if absolute velocity value is equal or less than 0.

The specified value is a maximal value for the servo motion.
